title: Rp
body: Is there a possible way to gain 1 rp because i need one rp to get a box and key but i don't have the money to buy more rp

replies.body:
If you draw something for them, I'm sure they would be glad to give you 1 RP for your art!
{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

HMMMMMMMMMMM that's weeeiiiiiird. I checked your account and it looks like you already have enough ^_^! If you don't see that rp, make sure you refresh your client really quick.

{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}
